oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Union Claim Agency documents relating to case of Woodson Cope
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Documents dated from Nov. 30, 1866 to Sept. 2, 1867 of the Washington, DC "Union Claim Agency of B. D. Hyam" pertaining to the Civil War damage claim of Hawkins County resident Woodson Cope. Hyam's Washington law firm apparently specialized in facilitating early postwar claims for Civil War damages filed by citizens against the US government.
